comment: I had her for grant writing. She displays knowledge in grant and proposal writing, she does not know how to translate that knowledge into teaching she would show power points about grant writing but never walk us through the process of grant writing during class. Would you give passive aggressive comments on feedback.

Powell is great. Fair and kind. Like someone else said, the readings are posted in the class, so I just listened to them while I worked out. You can listen to most of the lectures, too. It was good for my lifestyle. And I learned some stuff.

She warns you that she has a dark sense of humor. If you are into that, she's hilarious. The important stuff--free textbook, open book everything, no discussions or papers. Practice exercises to prep for graded assignments. It's not show up and get an A. But like, throw some effort at it once a week and get an A. Would take again.
Nice person. Easy to talk too. Tech Savvy. Wants you to succeed. I sort of halfway read. did the extra credit work. Asked questions. looked at the class once a week. Got a B. Thought that was fair.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: I was confident at the beginning of the semester because there were tons of assignments to be graded on. However, it was very unorganized. Many work assignments were hidden within links on D2L. She didn't respond to most emails first try & the grading instructions were never clear. ENGL 2300 is the only class I have to retake...

Super easy course and super nice professor! The only turnoff for me was I took an online course and there was a group project. When you like to get things done and your peers refuse to complete anything ahead of the due date, an online group project is ridiculous.
this was the worst professor ive ever had. she grades very tough and the instructions for her online course are awful.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Get ready to read

comment: Be ready to clear your schedule and dedicate yourself to all the reading and assignments in this class. Too bad if you have a job. Stuff is all over the class site and may jump from one module to the other. It is like a scavenger hunt. Unless you have to take this class, then don't do it.

This professor underestimated me as a student from the first assignment. She said i was "multi-tasking" and couldn't stay organized for an online course. Um, I signed up for an online course to make my time more managable! Funny, how regardless how difficult her course was I still got a B! Cheers to graduation and multi-tasking! Trash of a class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Horrible online class, hardest I have taken! She hides assignments, she uses countless different programs for assignments, which is very confusing, and if you send her a specific question on email-she'll respond back with a  huge email that doesn't even answer your questions.  DO NOT TAKE HER!!! Worst Professor ever!

If you are look for an easy A, this class is not for you. She is a wonderful professor who has a passion for her work, course, and students. She is extremely knowledgeable of her work. Her course work was quite heavy. She is also quick with emails and pushes students to communicate with her. Definitely recommended if you want to feel fulfilled.

Do not take this professor unless English is your major. She seems to loathe the idea that most student take this class as a requirement, and NOT as an elective. She literally wants you at her mercy. She assigns busy work(tons of assignments) and is ambiguous with responses when you ask questions. Take her at your peril.

She says we can email her with questions but all she says is refer to lectures. She is very uptight and conceded about her status as a professor. I agree with the comment below mine. Talks down to students. Its an easy class but she makes it difficult and she admit she does.

Constantly speaks down to us in her lectures. Her online content is very bad and barely organized and never consistent. Rants about plagarism of our papers before we even turn it in. Made us feel like trash every step of the way. She does know her stuff, that is true, but I feel like she wants to prove that she is better than us at every step.

Awesome teacher! Best online class I have ever had. She's very helpful when it comes to questions, whether basic technology questions or questions regarding assignments. Useful and interesting class. The assignments are not the most easy but definitely useful training. Very friendly and knowledgable professor. Easy A!
Great class. Great instructor. Highly recommend that anyone take her class. :)

Online class - highly recommend for required 2160 class.  There is a considerable amount of "assignments" but they are quick, and if you schedule the short time in each week, you'll be all set.  Easy to get an A - everything is open note/open book.  Completely online - some lectures are recordings, not powerpoint, which can be hard to fit in.

I took the online class with Dr. Powell. She was very helpful by phone or e-mail. Make sure you do the readings and listen to the lectures. You really have to read her instructions carefully becuase there is a lot of information. But the online class was easy, just keep up with the assignments.
